sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; function Cart() { const item = useSelector((state)=> state.shop.cart) const count = useSelector((state)=> state.shop.itemCount) let total = 0; console.log(item) return (
Items-added
{item.map((item)=>(
{(total += item.price.slice(1, item.price.length) * 119 * count)}

{item.name}

Rs {item.price.slice(1, item.price.length) * 119}
{/* */} item : {count}
))}

Total Amount: Rs {total}

) } export default Cart
